mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User Where flagUseable = 'yes' and (loginName = #{loginName} and loginPassword = PASSWORD(#{password})) LIMIT 1

SELECT User_Favorite.createDate as createDate , User_Favorite.carModelLv1 as carModelLv1 , Car_Model_Lv1.cname as carModelLv1FullName , Car_Brand.cname as brandCName FROM User_Favorite LEFT JOIN Car_Model_Lv1 on User_Favorite.carModelLv1 = Car_Model_Lv1.id LEFT JOIN Car_Brand on Car_Model_Lv1.carBrand = Car_Brand.id WHERE User_Favorite.user = #{userId}
